name: JJBA Vento Aureo: Bruno Bucciarati's Perspective Part 1
name_original: JJBA Vento Aureo: Bruno Bucciarati's Perspective Part 1
description: A retelling of the beginning arc from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 5: Golden Wind/Vento Aureo, told from Bruno Bucciarati's perspective. Includes a couple of branching paths that will make the story more interesting for players unfamiliar with JoJo.
